name: arc
description: CLI tools for semantic and full-text search across Qdrant and MeiliSearch. Use 'arc corpus' commands to create dual-indexed corpora for both search types. Index PDFs, markdown, and source code with AST-aware chunking, frontmatter extraction, and git awareness. Store agent-generated content for long-term memory with rich metadata. Agents using this plugin require Bash(arc:*) permission.
